description.value: Scenario 3.x - Receive MedicationData for J. de XXX_Luzac.
Specifies the query that runs and general checks on the response.
Test server to handle a Bundle of type transaction.
Checks if all resources specified by the scenario can be identified unambiguously.

Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 MedicationDispense resource(s) that reference(s) Medication with coding '1110837|urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.7' (ASPIRINE PROTECT EC TABLET MSR 100MG) and contain(s) no ext-StopType and contain(s) no

expression.value: Bundle.entry.select(resource as MedicationDispense).where(medication.resolve().code.coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.7' and code = '1110837')).where(modifierExtension.where(url = 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-StopType').value.coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '410546004')).where(reasonCode.exists().not()).count() = 1
